skill.name: code-review
skill.description: This skill should be used when the user requests a code review of changed files. Use this to review git-diffed files for security vulnerabilities (OWASP Top 10), performance issues (O(N) complexity, ORM optimization), bugs, and adherence to project coding standards defined in agents.md and claude.md.

skill.author: DavidDworetzky

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill with minimal risk. Contains a helper shell script for git operations. No network access, no credential access, no code execution capabilities beyond safe git commands.

content.user_title: Review code for security and performance
content.value_statement: Code changes can introduce security vulnerabilities and performance problems that are expensive to fix later. This skill automates comprehensive code reviews on modified files, checking for OWASP Top 10 issues, N+1 queries, and code quality problems.
actual_capabilities: Review changed files for OWASP Top 10 security vulnerabilities
Detect N+1 queries and ORM optimization issues
Check for SQL injection and command injection patterns
Identify performance problems like inefficient loops
Verify adherence to project coding standards
Generate detailed code review reports with fixes
limitations: Does not run tests or execute code
Cannot access external APIs or services
Limited to files visible in git working directory
Does not modify code automatically without user approval

use_cases.title: Pre-commit code review
use_cases.description: Review all modified files before committing to catch security issues and performance problems early.

use_cases.title: Automated security scan
use_cases.description: Systematically check code changes for OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities without manual inspection.

use_cases.title: Code quality enforcement
use_cases.description: Ensure all changes follow project standards and coding conventions consistently.

prompt_templates.title: Basic review
prompt_templates.prompt: Review the modified files in this repository for security vulnerabilities and performance issues.

prompt_templates.title: Security focused
prompt_templates.prompt: Perform a security review on changed files. Focus on OWASP Top 10 issues like SQL injection, XSS, and broken authentication.

prompt_templates.title: Performance scan
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze the modified files for performance issues. Look for N+1 queries, inefficient loops, and missing database indexes.

prompt_templates.title: Full audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Conduct a comprehensive code review on all changed files. Check security, performance, code quality, and project standards. Provide detailed findings with fix recommendations.

output_examples.input: Review modified files for security issues
output: - Raw string concatenation allows SQL injection
- FIX: Use parameterized queries with SQLAlchemy ORM
- Lazy loading in loop causes 101 queries
- FIX: Use selectinload(User.posts) for eager loading
- Consider adding indexes on foreign keys
- Add input validation for user authentication

best_practices: Review changes before every commit to catch issues early
Fix critical security issues immediately before merging
Use the review output as a learning opportunity for the team
anti_patterns: Ignoring performance warnings for small features
Not updating security checks when dependencies change

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. All three tools can invoke the code review workflow.

faq.question: What security issues does it check for?
faq.answer: The skill reviews for OWASP Top 10 issues including SQL injection, XSS, broken authentication, and sensitive data exposure.

faq.question: Does it modify my code?
faq.answer: No. The skill identifies issues and suggests fixes. It asks for approval before making any changes to your codebase.

faq.question: Is my code data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. All analysis happens locally through git operations. No code is sent to external services or third parties.

faq.question: Can it review any programming language?
faq.answer: The skill focuses on Python and SQLAlchemy patterns. It can review other languages for general security and performance issues.

faq.question: How does this compare to SonarQube or other tools?
faq.answer: This skill provides AI-powered contextual analysis. Static tools like SonarQube complement it with additional metrics and rules.
